title: Keep the Spark (& the Kids) Alive with Larry Hagner
itunes:title: Keep the Spark (& the Kids) Alive with Larry Hagner
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Dr. Emily is joined by host of The Dad Edge Podcast Larry Hagner to talk about all things fatherhood, masculinity, and sex.  The two discuss what the 5 Dimensions of fatherhood are and why it’s important when it comes to...
description:
On today’s show, Dr. Emily is joined by host of The Dad Edge Podcast Larry Hagner to talk about all things fatherhood, masculinity, and sex. 

The two discuss what the 5 Dimensions of fatherhood are and why it’s important when it comes to being a successful parent – which includes prioritizing your intimate relationship – because you’re not just parents, you’re lovers. Plus, how to be the best role model for your kids and ways to talk to them about sex and pleasure.


Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex talk, tips, & tricks visit sexwithemily.com For more info on Larry Hagner, click HERE.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
